Subject: Thoughts.
From: "Carnage Blood" <Carnage@...>

** Vlad followed Fenox to his quarters, looking at the door to it and then turning hid optics to her with a blank expression.** � Thank you.� ** Was all he said before he slipped into the room with Shesta at his heels, the door closing suddenly behind him and sealing. He didn�t mean to be rude and if he had seemed so he would make it up to Fenox later, he simply wanted to be alone for the moment.   Instead, Vlad looked around the room he was given, Shesta leaving him to sniff around the perimeter. She was very curious about this place and it was a good idea to get to know it since they would be staying for a while. Eventually she wandered into the bedroom half of the living space, and this time it was Vlads turn to follow. He�d observed the remainder of the quarters and decided that it met his liking but the whole day had been a stress trip and he felt as if he had run the longest race ever known to bot-kind. His joints felt numb and he sighed in relaxment as he fell onto his back on the bed, thinking that this had to be the softest bed he had ever laid upon, just as anyone else would think when they hadn�t slept in a bed for weeks.
Vlad looked up at the roof and closed his optics, relaxing his muscles and throwing his cape onto the floor. Maybe later he�d get that Fenox chick to show him around the base and meet up with the commander of this whole organization, may even make an impression on him. But first he had to get that woman away from that wolf-bot, otherwise there could be problems�.**
